modName: Patch for JK's Markarth and Dragon Break Episodes 1 and 2
summary: A very simple compatibility patch removing a few object references from JK's Markarth that were blocking an important quest location in Darren83's Dragon Break Episodes 1 and 2 - Bad Wolf and The infinity engine.
descriptionHtml:
Greetings! This is my first mod, and it's absolutely nothing spectacular. Just a quick fix for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1305814/?]JKrojmal's[/url] excellent [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58283/]JK's Markarth[/url][/i] mod when used with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8671518/?]Darren83's[/url] equally great [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50882/]Dragon Break Episodes 1 and 2 - Bad Wolf and The infinity engine[/url][/i]. Specifically, JK's mod adds a bunch of items to the same place as a vital quest location in Darren83's mod. All this small ESP does is disable JK's edits in that specific area. Pretty straightforward, made using TES5Edit.

Technically, this ESP only requires JKs Markarth.esp. Nothing in any of the Dragon Break plugins is touched, and this file does not depend on it as a master. That said, why would you use this if you didn't need it?

For the technically inclined, this sets the InitiallyDisabled flag for a couple dozen references in JK's Markarth.esp:
[list][*][font=Courier New]xx0012E2[/font][/*]
[*][font=Courier New]xx001FA8[/font]
[/*]
[*][font=Courier New]xx001FE3[/font] through [font=Courier New]xx001FF8[/font][/*]
[*][font=Courier New]xx001FFB[/font] through [font=Courier New]xx00202B[/font][/*]
[/list]
I'm assuming this is permissible because I'm not using any assets from either [i]JK's Markarth[/i] or [i]Dragon Break[/i], merely disabling a few references in the former. That said, I will remove this immediately if requested by either mod's author.
author: seancdaug

files.name: Patch for JKs Markarth and Dragon Break
